titleStmt.title: A right godly and learned exposition, vpon the whole booke of Psalmes wherein is set forth the true diuision, sence, and doctrine contained in euery Psalme: for the great furtheraunce and necessarie instruction of euery Christian reader. Newly and faithfully set forth by a godly minister and preacher of the word of God.
titleStmt.author: T. W. (Thomas Wilcox), 1549?-1608.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed [by Thomas Dawson] for T. Man, and W. Brome,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: An exposition vpon the whole booke of Psalmes.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
